build2.place_build_banner: 해당 건물 옆 접근할 수 있는 위치에 배너를 배치합니다.

destroy_building_confirm.title: 건물 철거
destroy_building_confirm.message: 정말로 이 건물을 부수고 싶습니까? 이 작업은 되돌릴 수 없습니다!

plan_job_status.INVALID_BLUEPRINTS: 해당 건물에 잘못된 부분이 있습니다. 빨간색 구조물이 없는지 확인하십시오!
plan_job_status.PLANNING_ERROR_GENERIC: 하슬링이 이 건물을 짓는 방법을 찾지 못하고 있습니다! 문제가 있는 블록은 빨간색으로 표시됩니다.

visions.building_vision_description: 벽의 가시성을 바꿔서, 건물 내부를 볼 수 있습니다.
visions.terrain_slice_vision_description: 지형을 단면으로 나누어 지하 구조물을 볼 수 있습니다. 높이에 따라 다른 단면을 볼 수 있습니다.
visions.terrain_xray_vision_description: 지형을 통과하여 볼 수 있습니다. 전체 혹은 편평으로 바꾸어 지하 벽을 볼 수 있습니다.
visions.appeal_vision_description: 하슬링들이 느끼는 매력 수치를 볼 수 있습니다.

promotion_tree.title: 직업 선택 -
promotion_tree.text_1: 끊임없는 노력과 탄력성에 대한 경의를 표하며, 우리는 다음과 같이 진행합니다:

multiplayer_menu.remote_connections_disabled_description: 다른 플레이어가 게임에 참여할 수 있도록 설정에서 멀티플레이어 활성화하세요.

erase_player.title: 플레이어 소지품 파괴
erase_player.message: 이 플레이어의 모든 소지품을 파괴하시겠습니까? 그러면 이 플레이어의 마을도 게임에서 제거됩니다. 이 작업은 되돌릴 수 없습니다.

transfer_player.title: 플레이어 소지품 박탈
transfer_player.message: 이 플레이어의 소지품을 모두 가져가시겠습니까? 그러면 이 플레이어의 마을도 게임에서 제거됩니다. 이 작업은 되돌릴 수 없습니다.

friends_overlay.title: 친구 초대
friends_overlay.message: '계속'을 클릭하여 스팀 오버레이를 엽니다. 게임에 초대할 친구를 마우스 오른쪽 단추로 클릭하고 '게임 초대'를 클릭합니다. 그들은 스팀 채팅에 참여할 수 있는 링크를 얻을 것이다.

build_workshop.title: 작업대 건설
build_workshop.create_stockpile_description:
제작가는 제작품들을 이곳에 보관할 것입니다.

당신은 아마도 그것을 작업대 근처에 놓고 싶겠지만, 결정하기 나름입니다.
build_workshop.page1_subtitle2: 땅 위를 클릭해서 설치할 수 있습니다.
build_workshop.page2_subtitle2: 땅 위를 드래그 해서 설치할 수 있습니다.

teleport.description: 이 시민이 어딘가에 갇히게 된다면, 비상 방지봉을 사용하여 텔레포트할 수 있는 가까운 장소를 선택하십시오(시민은 유휴 상태). 자정에 충전합니다.
teleport.disabled_description: 이 시민은 오늘 이미 텔레포트 했습니다. 자정 이후에 다시 시도하십시오.
teleport.not_idle_description: 시민이 유휴 상태가 아니므로 현재 고정 해제 기능을 사용할 수 없습니다.
teleport.different_player_description: 다른 플레이어의 시민은 비상 해제를 할 수 없습니다.

appeal_headings.like_tooltip: 해당 아이템에 대해서 더욱 아름답게 보입니다. (한 공간에 최대 3개)
appeal_headings.love_tooltip: 해당 아이템은 이 공간에 대한 [str(self.stonehearth:unit_info.custom_name)]의 의견을 크게 향상시킬 것입니다.
appeal_headings.dislike_tooltip: [str(self.stonehearth:unit_info.custom_name)]은(는) 품질에 관계 없이 언제나 매력적이지 않다고 생각합니다.
appeal_headings.current_and_target_bar_tooltip: [str(self.stoneheart:unit_info.custom_name)]의 주변 및 최근 방문한 지역에 대한 의견.
appeal_headings.current_arrow_tooltip: [str(self.stoneheart:unit_info.custom_name)]의 호소에 대한 전반적인 의견. 그들의 기분에 영향을 줍니다.
appeal_headings.target_arrow_tooltip: [str(self.stoneheart:unit_info.custom_name)]이(가) 직접 주변 환경을 보는 방법. 시간이 지남에 따라 마을에 대한 그들의 전반적인 의견에 영향을 줍니다.

release_pet_confirm_dialog.title: 애완동물 방생하기

camera.camera_pan_1: 스페이스 바를 누른 다음, 마우스를 움직입니다.
camera.camera_pan_3: 또는 마우스 휠을 누르고 마우스를 움직입니다.
camera.camera_orbit_1: 마우스 오른쪽 버튼을 클릭하고 드래그 하여 카메라를 회전시킵니다.
camera.camera_zoom_title: 확대⁄축소 및 축소하려면 다음과 같이 하십시오.

save_view.title: 게임 저장하기

save_view.opt_text: 게임 개발에 도움이 되기 위해 익명으로 당신의 컴퓨터 사양과 게임 플레이 데이터를 수집하고 싶습니다.

당신의 모든 하슬링들은 침입자들을 항상 주시하며,

party_1.description: 전투 하슬링들을 직접 전투에 참가시키세요! 전투 계열 직업으로 전직하면 자동으로 이 곳에 추가됩니다.

party_2.description: 전투 하슬링들을 직접 전투에 참가시키세요! 전투 계열 직업으로 전직하면 자동으로 이 곳에 추가됩니다.

reembarkation.title: A new adventure awaits!
reembarkation.prompt: Select a crew to depart on a new adventure, and choose items for them to take along!

town_upgrade_choice.title: Official Settlement Declaration
town_upgrade_choice.name_header: Choose a name for your settlement!

tooltips.food: 고품질의 음식은 더 높은 음식 점수를 제공한다.
tooltips.morale: 하슬링들이 만족감을 얻을 수 있도록 안전함과 편안함을 유지하세요.
tooltips.net_worth: 당신 마을의 예상 가치입니다. 아이템과 금화를 모으고, 건물을 짓어서 여러분의 순자산을 증가시키세요.

inventory_full.title: 마을 저장고 꽉 참!
inventory_full.message: 당신의 소유 아이템이 최대치에 도달했습니다! 각각의 하슬링들은 마을이 가질 수 있는 최대치를 증가시킵니다. 만약 마을이 소유한 아이템이 너무 많다면, 하슬링들은 더 이상 수확과 채집을 할 수 없게 됩니다. 보관함은 당신의 아이템 최대치를 늘리지 못합니다. 상인에게 판매하거나 지우기 툴을 사용하여 공간을 확보하세요.

early_warning.title: You've reached [str(i18n_data.num_citizens)] citizens!
early_warning.message:
Congratulations! Your town has become a solid community.

A performance-related warning: More citizens mean more AI processing. Lower-spec computers may experience increased hitching, lag, and idling citizens.

If you encounter these issues, try reducing your town's maximum citizen limit in the Gameplay tab of the Settings Menu. This will prevent new settlers from joining as long as you're over that cap.

full_warning.message:
You've just reached [str(i18n_data.num_citizens)] citizens, the maximum number of that can live in your town.

New citizens will no longer join your town at this point, unless you drop back below this number.

Note: You can change this limit in the Gameplay tab of the Settings Menu. A small warning - having too many citizens may cause increased hitching, lag, and idling citizens.
full_warning.title: Max citizens reached!

first.title: Your First Traveller!
first.message:
[str(i18n_data.traveler_name)] came to visit!

Travellers will stop by as long as there are beds reserved for them. They'll admire your town, chat with your citizens, shop at your markets, and even leave gifts for you if they had a pleasant visit.

Happy travellers will spread word of your town, and it will become a more popular destination over time!

summary.title: Traveller Summary
summary.text: The travellers loved your town today! They left these gifts for you:

disabled.destroy: Can't destroy buildings you don't own.
disabled.build: Can't build, pause, or resume buildings you don't own.

overhead_tips.erase_structure_tip_title: 클릭하여 아이템을 지웁니다. 클릭 후 드래그하면 바닥을 지웁니다.
overhead_tips.doodad_tip_title: 클릭하여 벽에 문 또는 창문을 배치합니다.
overhead_tips.stairs_tip_description: , 키와 .키로 회전하고, 우클릭으로 나갈 수 있습니다.

pasture.help: 양치기는 이 지역에 동물들을 데리고 와서 그들을 돌봅니다.
pasture.sheep_pasture_description: 양은 양털을 생산하며 고기를 얻을 수 있습니다.
pasture.poyo_pasture_description: 닭은 달걀을 생산하며, 요리에 사용할 수 있습니다.

stockpile.help: 체크박스나 아이콘을 눌러서 저장할 물품의 종류를 선택할 수 있습니다.

about.title: 스톤하스 소개
about.attributions: 스톤하스에서 사용하는 오픈 소스 소프트웨어 입니다:

sections.special_thanks_endnote: ...everyone who makes discourse.stonehearth.net a wonderful community,
sections.special_thanks_endnote_2: ...everyone who followed our regular Thursday Streams,
sections.special_thanks_endnote_3: ...and everyone who gave Stonehearth a chance!

kickstarter_tiers.45: Kickstarter Backers - Settler Tier, Beta Buddy

team_titles.brad: The Pun is Mightier than the Sword

tips.000: 만약 당신의 일꾼들이 갇힌다면, 당신은 사다리를 지어서 그들을 꺼낼 수 있습니다!
tips.001: 하슬링들에게 침대를 만들어주면 밤에 더 편하게 잘 수 있습니다.
tips.002: 당신의 목장 주변에 울타리들을 만들어 두어서 기르는 동물들이 안전하게 머무를 수 있도록 하세요.
tips.003: 비축소에서 특정 종류의 아이템만 보관할 수 있도록 변경할 수 있습니다.
tips.004: 섬유질을 꾸준히 공급하기 위해서 인주솜풀를 재배할 수 있습니다.
tips.006: < 키와 > 키를 사용하여 아이템을 배치하기 전에 건물을 회전시킬 수 있습니다.
tips.007: 길 위에서는 하슬링이 더 빠르게 움직입니다.
tips.008: 방직공은 일꾼들의 효율를 높이는 새로운 유니폼을 만들어 낼 수 있습니다.
tips.009: 앉아서 식사하는 것은 소화를 촉진시킵니다. 식탁용 탁자와 의자를 만들어보세요.
tips.010: 양치기는 목장을 채우기 위해 스스로 양을 찾으러 돌아다닐 것입니다.
tips.011: 마을의 더 높은 순자산을 원한다면,재고품을 상인에게 판매하세요.
tips.012: 자원과 음식은 마을의 순자산에 기여하지 않습니다.
tips.013: 호기심 속성은 추가 경험치를 얻을 수 있습니다.
tips.014: 고품질 아이템은 더 높은 순자산 가치가 있습니다.
tips.016: 터널 문을 사용하여 광산 입구를 차단할 수 있습니다
tips.017: 하슬링들이 마을 밖으로 떠나는 걸 원치 않으세요? 엔지니어의 잠금식 문으로 해결해보세요.
tips.018: 높은 사고 능력을 가진 하슬링은 좋은 기술자가 될 것입니다.
tips.019: 음식 비축소를 일하는 곳 가까이에 배치하여 하슬링들이 접근하기 쉽도록 만들어보세요.
tips.020: 사냥꾼는 산과 사막에도 덫을 놓을 수 있지만, 동물을 잡기에는 더 어려울 것입니다.
tips.021: 시민 메뉴에서 전투원의 직업를 해제하여, 전투에서 휴식을 취하도록 강요할 수 있습니다.
tips.022: 땅을 파는 도중에 가끔 흙이 쌓여서 점토와 석재가 생길 수 있습니다.
tips.023: 여러분은 산의 겉면에서 광맥을 발견할 수 있습니다.
tips.024: 음식 공급원이 필요한가요? 열매 덤불이나 선인장을 가까운 곳으로 옮기세요.
tips.025: 고블린 족장을 패배시킨 뒤, 블루벨 양을 내 것으로 할 수 있습니다.
tips.026: 당신의 하슬링들은 비좁은 공간에 너무 오랫동안 생활하는 것을 좋아하지 않습니다.
tips.027: 목장에 같은 동물이 2마리 이상 있다면 번식하여 개체 수를 늘릴 수 있습니다.
tips.028: Use "shift + ," to sink your building template's foundation before placing it.

terrain_stats.trees_and_plants_description: 목재는 주요 건물 자원입니다. 이 외에도 침대, 테이블, 의자 같은 물건을 만드는 데 필요합니다.
terrain_stats.wildlife_description: 야생 동물을 사냥하여 음식 및 원자재를 구할 수 있습니다.
terrain_stats.minerals_description: 돌이나 금속으로 무언가를 만들 계획이라면 광물이 필요할 것입니다.

settings.title: 설정
settings.gfx_enable_dynamic_icons_tooltip: If disabled, speech bubbles will not show topic icons, but this can solve hitches on older graphics chips.
settings.gfx_disable_deferred_renderer_descriptio: WARNING: Using the fallback renderer will cause performance issues in cities with a lot of lights. Only use it as a last resort.
settings.force_32_bit_note: * 문제가 있을 때만 강제 32bit로 변경하세요. 64bit는 더욱 빠르고 큰 도시를 지원합니다.

gameplay_tab.title: 게임플레이
gameplay_tab.advanced_description: WARNING: These settings may affect game stability and performance! Change at your own risk!
gameplay_tab.default_storage_filter_none_description: 저장소나 상자를 설치했을 때 기본 필터를 '모두'가 아닌 '없음'으로 설정합니다.
gameplay_tab.default_mining_zones_suspended_descripti: When creating a new mining zone, it will start suspended and won't be mined until you manually unsuspend it.
gameplay_tab.max_citizens_description:
Change the limit on maximum number of citizens you can have in your town.

Warning: Having more than 20 hearthlings can cause performance issues including AI unresponsiveness/idling and hitching.
gameplay_tab.randomize_attributes_description: 이 옵션을 활성화할 경우, 등장하는 하스링의 정신, 육체, 영혼 속성이 균형 없이 랜덤하게 출현합니다.
gameplay_tab.auto_rescue_description: When a citizen is incapacitated, automatically flag them for Rescue.
gameplay_tab.building_auto_queue_crafters_description: 건물 공사에 필요한 모든 가구와 비품들을 자동으로 제작에 들어가도록 설정해줍니다.
gameplay_tab.infinite_inventory_description:
This will the remove the limit on the maximum number of items you can have in your town inventory.

Note: You must restart the game for this to take effect!

Warning: Having too many items in the game will affect game performance.

mods_tab.title: 설치된 모듈
mods_tab.note: 모듈을 활성화하거나 비활성화를 위해서는 게임을 재시작 해야 합니다.

mods_changed_dialog.title: 모듈 변경
mods_changed_dialog.message: 모듈 변경사항을 적용하기 위해서는 게임을 재시작해야 합니다. 재시작하시겠습니까?

alpha_welcome_dialog.title: 스톤하스에 오신 것을 환영합니다!
alpha_welcome_dialog.message:
주의: 이 게임은 알파버전의 소프트웨어입니다. 아직 많은 부분이 미흡하며 여러가지 버그가 존재할 것입니다.

당신이 게임을 플레이하면서 생기는 충돌를 자동으로 보내주신다면 많은 도움이 될 것입니다. 동의해 주시겠습니까?

mod_conflic_dialog.title: 모듈 충돌이 감지되었습니다!
mod_conflic_dialog.message: 경고 : mods 디렉토리에는 .smod와 일부 모드의 flat 폴더가 포함되어 있습니다. flat 폴더 모드는 게임에서 사용됩니다. 이 모드는 .smod가 업데이트되어 버그가 발생할 때 오래된 버전이됩니다. 영향을 받는 모드는 다음과 같습니다.:

mod_dependency_conflict.title: Module Circular Dependency Detected!
mod_dependency_conflict.message:
Warning: You have mods that have circular dependencies (e.g. mod A depends on another mod B that eventually leads back to mod A). Mod dependencies specify what order the mods should be loaded in, but if there is a cycle, then we cannot determine which order to load them in.

Resolve the cycle mod dependencies inside of the affected mods' manifests. The affected mods have been temporarily disabled:

ace_dialog.title: Turn on Authorized Community Expansion (ACE)?
ace_dialog.message:
ACE is a mod that was born out of the desire of a group of awesome community members to create a richer and more complete Stonehearth experience. It includes features intended to enhance the game, such as new classes, UX changes, biomes, items and more!

Note: As with any mod, your play experience will differ from the base game. ACE adds a lot of content, so you may need a more powerful machine in order to experience it the way it was intended. (You can always enable or disable it from the title screen or Mods Menu later).

Would you like to enable their mod?

enable.title: Turn on ACE?
enable.message: The game will have to reload to enable ACE. Would you like to continue?
enable.tooltip: Turn on Stonehearth's Authorized Community Expansion.

disable.title: Turn off ACE?
disable.message: The game will have to reload to disable ACE. Would you like to continue?
disable.tooltip: Turn off Stonehearth's Authorized Community Expansion.

mods_menu.title: Mods
mods_menu.note: Enabling or disabling a module requires a game reload.

tooltips.edit_templates: Edit this mod's list of templates

unsubscribe_dialog.title: Are you sure you want to unsubscribe?
unsubscribe_dialog.message: This will erase the mod from your local machine, but you can find the mod again in the Steam Workshop.

duplicates_dialog.title: Duplicate Mods Enabled
duplicates_dialog.message: You currently have more than one mod with the same name enabled. Make sure you have only one version enabled at a time. Your current duplicates:

load_match_mods.title: Different Mods
load_match_mods.note: This game was saved with different mods than the ones you currently have enabled.
load_match_mods.old_save_note: This game was saved before enabled mods were stored in the save. These are the mods you currently have enabled.

warning_dialog.title: Warning
warning_dialog.message: Playing with different mods than the game was saved with could lead to unexpected errors or crashes. Do you want to continue?

missing.description: These mods are missing (ie. deleted or unsubscribed).

type_mismatch.description: Save had a different version of these mods enabled.

hash_mismatch.description: These mods have been modified since the save.

additional.description: These mods were not in the save.

disabled.description: These mods were in the save and are currently disabled.

normal.description: These mods haven't changed since the save.

descriptions.apply_saved: Enable mods used in this save and disable all others.
descriptions.continue_anyway: Use current mod configuration. May cause errors.

load_match_mods.view_in_workshop: View mod in workshop. Note: You must restart the game to apply changes if you subscribe to this mod.

load_match_mod_order.title: Different Mod Order
load_match_mod_order.note: This game was saved with mods in a different order than your current game.
load_match_mod_order.old_save_note: This game was saved before mod order was stored in the save. These are the mods you currently have enabled, in order.

warning_dialog.title: Warning
warning_dialog.message: Playing with different mod order than the game was saved with could lead to unexpected errors or crashes. Do you want to continue?

time_elapsed.days: Game Time Since Start: [str(date.day)] Days, [str(date.hour)] Hours
time_elapsed.months: Game Time Since Start: [str(date.month)] Months, [str(date.day)] Days, [str(date.hour)] Hours
time_elapsed.years: Game Time Since Start: [str(date.year)] Years, [str(date.month)] Months, [str(date.day)] Days, [str(date.hour)] Hours

mods_sync.note: The game you are trying to join has the following mods.
mods_sync.missing_note: The game you are trying to join has the following mods. You must have the same mods and versions in order to join.
mods_sync.version_note:
Warning: Your version of Stonehearth does not match the game you are trying to connect to!
This could prevent you from being able to connect, or lead to unexpected bugs during gameplay.
mods_sync.no_steam_cant_sync: You are missing one or more of the above mods. Ask your host to send them to you, or connect to Steam and look for them in the Steam workshop.
mods_sync.not_seen_in_workshop_cant_sync: One or more of the missing mods is unavailable in the Steam Workshop. They might not be uploaded, or only be viewable by the host. Ask them to upload or change their permissions, then try connecting again.
mods_sync.mismatched_hash_workshop_cant_sync: One of your Steam mods does not match the version that the host server is using. The mod's files may have been modified or the host is using a mod that is not up-to-date with the Steam version. Try deleting the mod and re-subscribing to get the Workshop version, or tell the host to update their Steam Workshop mods.
mods_sync.failed_download_workshop_update_cant_syn: One or more of your mods doesn't match the version the host server has. Game was unable to download the workshop update for one of the mods because the mod steam file id invalid or you are logged out of steam.

mod_upload.title: [str(i18n_data.action)] mod "[str(i18n_data.modname)]"
mod_upload.opt_title_placeholder: Title for your steam workshop mod
mod_upload.opt_tags_tooltip: Tags must be separated by commas. Each tag can be at most 255 characters.
mod_upload.opt_building_template_preview_images: Use building template screenshots as additional preview images
mod_upload.opt_building_template_preview_images_too:
Add an additional preview image for every template in your building template mod.

Warning: This will overwrite all existing preview images (except the main preview image) for this steam workshop item and replace them with your building template screenshots.
mod_upload.opt_change_note_placeholder: A brief description of the changes made
mod_upload.building_template_mod: Is this a building templates mod?

errors.update_handle_invalid: Could not update mod [str(modname)]. Check that you have permissions to update this steam workshop item.
errors.invalid_title: Title cannot be empty or contain more than 129 bytes
errors.invalid_description: Description cannot be empty or contain more than 8000 bytes
errors.invalid_content_path: The directory for the mod [str(modname)] was not found. The directory name must match the mod namespace found in the manifest.
errors.invalid_param: Preview image file is smaller than 16 bytes or steam AppID does not match user AppID.
errors.access_denied: Could not find your steam license for Stonehearth
errors.file_not_found: Failed to get the workshop info for the item, failed to read the preview file, or provided content folder is not valid. Check that your steam_file_id is a valid workshop item.
errors.locking_failed: Failed to aquire UGC Lock for steam workshop item
errors.limit_exceeded: The preview image is too large (it must be less than 1 Megabyte) or there is not enough space available on your Steam Cloud
errors.generic: Could not update mod [str(modname)] on steam workshop

mod_create.opt_namespace_tooltip: The namespace for your mod that you will use to prefix alias references in your mod
mod_create.invalid_characters: * Cannot contain special characters or spaces

errors.duplicate_namespace: Your game already has a mod with the namespace [str(modname)]. Please try with another name
errors.protected_namespace: [str(modname)] is a protected namespace. Please try with another name.
errors.in_progress: Could not create mod [str(modname)]. Previous create mod process is still in progress
errors.insufficient_privilege: Your steam account does not have permission to make items for the Stonehearth community
errors.timeout: The create item operation took longer than expected. Try again
errors.not_logged_on: You are not currently logged into steam
errors.failed: Steam failed to create the mod

confirm.title: Save mod templates
confirm.message: Save changes to your mod template lists? This action cannot be undone.

select_game_story.title: 시작되는 모험
select_game_story.biome_section_start: 새로운 땅과 모험을 추구하면서 그들은 떠났습니다.

normal.description: 위험에 처한 세계에서 모험을 시작하십시오. 당신의 마을은 적들에게 두들겨 맞을 수 있습니다.

peaceful.description: 침입자들에 대해 걱정하지 않고 마을을 건설할 자유롭게 도시를 세울 수 있는 샌드박스 모드입니다.
peaceful.post_selection_text: 새롭게 출발할 수 있는 조용한 장소.

hard.description: 일반 난이도보다 더 어려운 몬드터들과 직면할 것입니다.

select_game_story.biome_warning_text:
사막 기후 또는 레야의 자손들의 온난 기후에 정착하기 위해 어센던시를 선택하게 되면, 제작 자원을 찾기가 어려울 수 있습니다. 이 문제는 곧 해결할 예정입니다.

계속 하시겠습니까?

select_roster.delete_crew_confirm_message: Are you sure you want to permanently delete the selected re-embarkation crew?
select_roster.name: 이름

template_palette.delete_template: This template file will be deleted

post_bug.title: 버그 정보
post_bug.message: 스톤하스 알파에 참여해 주셔서 감사합니다! 버그를 발견한다면
post_bug.file_bug_step_2: 활성 항목 목록을 확인하고, 아직 버그가 보고되지 않았다면 새 항목을 생성하십시오.
post_bug.file_bug_step_3: When filing bugs, please include screenshots of the error
post_bug.file_bug_step_4: 크래시가 발생하는 경우 http:⁄⁄discourse.stonehearth.net⁄t⁄13297에서 일반적인 해결 방법과 충돌에 대한 지원을 받는 방법을 확인하십시오. 사용자 고유 ID는 다음과 같습니다.:

stamina.description:
이 하슬링의 신체적인 지구력 지수입니다.
신체 지수에 영향을 받습니다.

inventiveness.description:
하슬링이 만드는 제작품의 품질 지수입니다.
사고 지수에 영향을 받습니다.

bullet_points.000: 매 2 포인트마다 고품질 아이템을 만들 확률이 1% 증가합니다.

inspiration.description: A flat modifier to this hearthing's chance to create items with Fine and Excellent quality.

bullet_points.000: A hearthling must be at least a Journeyman to create Fine quality items, and a Master to create Excellent items<⁄br>
bullet_points.001: Ranges from -2% to +3%, based on the hearthling's Spirit

shelter.description: 하슬링이 잠자리에 들 편안한 침대가 있는지 확인하세요.
shelter.town_description: 시민들의 숙박 상황에 대해 느끼는 지수입니다. 잠자리에 들어야 할 침대는 있나요?

compassion.description:
이 하슬링이 동료를 돕거나 다른 이들과 친구가 될 가능성 지수입니다.
정신 지수에 영향을 받습니다.

food.description: 다양한 종류와 검증된 품질의 음식이 있는지 확인하세요. 하슬링들은 익히지 않은 음식보다는 요리된 음식들을 더 좋아한다.
food.town_description: 시민들이 마을의 식량 사정에 대해 생각하는 지수입니다. 모두가 먹을만큼 충분한가요? 다양한 음식을 섭취하도록 노력하세요!

diligence.description:
휴식 시간이 필요하기 전, 오랫동안 일하는 시간입니다.
사고 지수에 영향을 받습니다.

net_worth.description: 당신 마을의 번영을 반영한 지수입니다. 물품, 건물, 농업이 이 점수에 포함됩니다.

courage.description:
전투에 직면했을 때의 발휘하는 용감함 지수입니다.
정신 지수에 영향을 받습니다.

muscle.description:
이 하슬링의 힘 지수입니다.
신체 지수에 영향을 받습니다.

speed.description:
하슬링의 이동 속도 지수입니다.
신체 지수에 영향을 받습니다.

body.description:
신체 활동 능력입니다. 높은 지수는 그만큼 더 빠르게 움직이고, 더 열심히 공격하며, 더 오래 살 수 있습니다.
근력, 민첩, 스태미나에 영향을 줍니다.

edibles.description: 마을의 재고에 포함된 모든 음식의 금화 지수입니다.
edibles.town_description: 마을의 재고에 포함된 모든 음식의 금화 지수입니다.

mind.description:
지능적으로 생각하는 능력 지수입니다. 높은 정신력은 제작 활동을 더욱 빠르게 진행합니다.
근면, 호기심, 창의력에 영향을 줍니다.

curiosity.description:
새로운 경험을 즐기는 지수입니다.
사고 지수에 영향을 받습니다.

spirit.description:
다른 사람들에 대한 믿음 지수. 높은 정신의 하슬링은 동물들과 쉽게 친해질 수 있고 적들에게 강하게 맞설 것입니다.
용기, 동정심에 영향을 줍니다.

safety.description: 마을을 침입자로부터 보호하고 경비을 배치함으로써 시민들을 안심시키세요.
safety.town_description: 시민들이 마을의 안전에 대한 생각 지수입니다. 이 마을은 고블린들에게서 잘 보호되고 있는가요?

inventory.description: 마을 재고에서 모든 비자원, 비식량 아이템의 금화 지수입니다.

buildings.description: 마을의 모든 건물의 가치. 큰 건물은 작은 건물보다 약간 높은 점수를 받을 것입니다.

agriculture.description: 마을의 농경지와 목장의 가치. 각각의 수확된 작물과 각각의 방목지 동물들이 수치에 반영됩니다.

military_strength.description: 마을이 얼마나 강력한지를 보여 주는 지수입니다. 전투 부대와 무장 무기, 갑옷이 이 수치에 기여합니다.

content.town_description: 당신의 시민들은 일이 진행되는 방식에 만족하고 있습니다.

forlorn.town_description: 요즘 당신의 시민들은 엄청나게 힘든 시간을 보내고 있어요.

glum.town_description: 당신의 시민들은 전반적으로 기분이 좋지 않습니다.

customization_lock.description: 이 하슬링의 [str(customization)]는 특성 및 상태를 돌리는 동안 저장됩니다.

customization_lock_all.description: Click to lock all name and appearance options.

customization_unlock_all.description: Click to unlock all name and appearance options.

working_for.description: Which town this citizen is currently working for

ascendancy.quote: 양? 있고. 호미? 체크. 검? 오케이. 승선하라!
ascendancy.description: 진지하고 열심히 일하고, 충성스럽습니다. 어센던시의 시민들은 이 알려진 세계에서 거주할 자신이 있다고 확신합니다.

temperate.description: 숲, 강과 산이 존재합니다. 어센던시의 고향입니다.

spring.description: Spring in the Forest is a season of rebirth, lasting three months. Rains melt the snows, revealing new growth hidden underneath, and trees come back to life covered with colorful blossoms.

summer.description: Summer in the Forest is the mildest season, lasting three months. It is a time to relax and bask in the sun, without worrying about storms or snow.

autumn.description: Autumn in the Forest is the harvest season, lasting three months. The trees turn to gold, and the grass prepares to retreat into its winter blanket, as the skies darken with storm clouds.

winter.description: Winter in the Forest is a cold season, lasting three months. Trees lose their leaves, and snow covers the landscape. The cold, biting winds are best countered by cozy gatherings around the hearth.

arctic.description: 눈 내린 높은 산과 큰 물을 가지고 있습니다. 북부 동맹의 고향입니다.

spring.description: Spring in the Arctic is a season of change, only lasting one month. While the highlands retain their snow cover year-round, the lowlands around the lakes start to thaw out and young grass begins to sprout.

summer.description: Summer in the Arctic is a season of rest, lasting three months. The weather is mild, and the lowlands are green with grass. It is a reprieve from the cold, and a time to regather strength for the long winter to come.

autumn.description: Autumn in the Arctic is a season of freeze, only lasting one month. Although blizzards are rare, snow is a daily occurrence. It is the last chance to build shelter before the unforgiving winter arrives.

winter.description: Winter in the Arctic is a season of hardship, lasting seven months. Weather is severe, with biting winds and unforgiving blizzards making farming exceedingly difficult. Even venturing outside without a winter outfit can end tragically.

desert.description: 건조하고 모래 투성이며, 마른 언덕과 초목이 무성합니다. 레야의 자손들의 고향입니다.

spring.description: Spring in the Desert is the wet season, lasting two months. It is a rare time for the water reserves to be replenished, leading the local flora to all bloom at once.

summer.description: Summer in the Desert is the storm season, lasting four months. Sandstorms ravage the landscape on almost a daily basis, and a town without ample shelter, be it walls, mountains, or underground dwellings, may have trouble surviving the onslaught.

autumn.description: Autumn in the Desert is the quiet season, lasting four months. The weather is hot, but milder than in the summer, with neither sandstorms nor precipitation. It is traditionally a time to rest after surviving the sandstorms of summer.

winter.description: Winter in the Desert is a cool season, lasting two months. Breezes blow over the dunes, bringing with them milder weather than in the autumn, and even the occasional snow cloud.

daily_report_encounter.title: 여행자가 당신의 마을에 접근하고 있습니다.
daily_report_encounter.conclusion_positive: 정착민이 당신의 마을에 정착하고 싶어 합니다!

messages.000: 나는 당신의 도시에 대해 많이 들었습니다!
messages.002: 너희들은 정말 손을 쓸 수 있을 것 같구나!
messages.003: 우와! 드디어 마을이! 저를 좀 도와주세요!

simple_caravan_encounter.message: 안녕하십니까? 언제나 [str(i18n_data.town_name)]마을은 언제 봐도 아름답군요! 저희가 이 아름다운 마을에 한가지 제안을 할까 합니다. [str(i18n_data.your_item)]  [str(i18n_data.your_quantity)]개를 [str(i18n_data.my_item)] [str(i18n_data.my_quantity)]개와 교환하지 않으시겠습니까?
simple_caravan_encounter.title: 캐러밴이 접근 중!

bulletin_message.000: 여기 오신 걸 환영합니다, 여러분! 이런, 당장 굶어죽을 것 같군요. 여기 당신을 도와줄 것들이 있어요. :
bulletin_message.001: Just celebrated Embarcation Day, eh? Buck up! You look like you'd really benefit from something tasty. How about I give you:
bulletin_message.002: 시드를 찬양하라! 당신의 시작에 도움을 줄 것들을 가져왔습니다.
bulletin_message.003: 산 넘어 긴 여행을 하셨군요? 지금 이 장소는 좋아보이는군요. 당신의 시작을 도와줄 작은 선물을 가져왔습니다!
bulletin_message.004: 여기 오신 걸 환영합니다, 항해사여!! 여기 당신의 시작을 위한 선물을 가져왔습니다!

returning_trader_encounter.title: 상인이 접근 중입니다.
returning_trader_encounter.trade_details: 안녕하세요. [str(i18n_data.town_name)]! 저는 지나가는 중인데 당신이 관심이 있다면 거래를 해보고 싶군요. 만약 당신이 나에게 [str(i18n_data.want_item)] [str(i18n_data.want_number)]개를 준다면, 나는 [str(i18n_data.num_days)] 일 뒤에 돌아와 [str(i18n_data.reward_item)] [str(i18n_data.reward_number)]개를 교환할 수 있을 것 같군요. 어떤가요?
returning_trader_encounter.waiting_text: 상인은 [str(i18n_data.hour_counter)] 시간 뒤에 돌아올 것입니다. 만약 당신이 [str(i18n_data.want_item)] [str(i18n_data.want_number)]개를 가지고 있다면 당신에게 [str(i18n_data.reward_item)] [str(i18n_data.reward_number)]개를 드리겠습니다.
returning_trader_encounter.return_greetings_positive: 돌아왔습니다! 제가 요청했던 [str(i18n_data.want_item)] [str(i18n_data.want_number)]개를 준비했군요. 여전히 저와 거래할 마음이 있으신가요? 그렇다면 [str(i18n_data.reward_item)] [str(i18n_data.reward_number)]개를 드리겠습니다. 괜찮은 제안이죠?
returning_trader_encounter.return_greetings_negative: 돌아왔습니다, 하지만 당신은 제가 요청했던 [str(i18n_data.want_item)] [str(i18n_data.want_number)]개를 준비하지 못한 것 같군요. 아쉽군요! 아마 다음 기회가 있을겁니다!

returning_crop_trader_encounter.title: 상인이 저 먼 곳으로부터 씨앗을 가져왔습니다.
returning_crop_trader_encounter.trade_details: 안녕하십니까 [str(i18n_data.town_name)]! 지나가는 중이었는데 만약 관심이 가는 것이 있다면 거래를 하고싶군요. 만약 당신이 [str(i18n_data.want_item)] [str(i18n_data.want_number)]개를 준다면, 나는 [str(i18n_data.num_days)]일 뒤에 돌아와 [str(i18n_data.reward_item)]을(를) 교환하고 싶군요. 어떻게 생각하시나요?
returning_crop_trader_encounter.waiting_text: 상인은 [str(i18n_data.hour_counter)] [str(i18n_data.period)] 뒤에 돌아와 [str(i18n_data.reward_item)]을(를) 줄 것입니다. 만약 당신이 [str(i18n_data.want_item)] [str(i18n_data.want_number)]개를 준비해두었다면요!
returning_crop_trader_encounter.return_greetings_positive: 돌아왔습니다! 제가 요청했던 [str(i18n_data.want_item)] [str(i18n_data.want_number)]개를 준비했군요. 여전히 저와 거래할 마음이 있으신가요? 그렇다면 [str(i18n_data.reward_item)]을(를) 드리겠습니다. 여전히 괜찮으신가요?
returning_crop_trader_encounter.return_greetings_negative: 돌아왔습니다. 하지만 제가 요청했던 [str(i18n_data.want_item)] [str(i18n_data.want_number)]개를 준비하지 못한 것 같군요. 안타깝네요! 아마 다음 기회가 있을겁니다!

valor_tier_2_reached.message: 축하드립니다, [str(i18n_data.town_name)]! 당신의 전투 기량은 널리 퍼졌습니다. 당신의 마을은 공식적으로 하나의 자치구로 인정받았습니다! 우리의 풍습대로 건축자재와 무역 협정을 준비해왔습니다.
valor_tier_2_reached.reward_message: 어센던시의 데니아 공주의 명에 따라 당신을 인정한다.
valor_tier_2_reached.reward_message_ctd: 전투에서의 믿을 수 없는 용맹함으로 인해 이 마을은 아래의 자격들을 갖게 되었습니다. :

valor_tier_2_reached.recipe_unlock_weapons_2: New Legendary Shield recipe - Blacksmith, Carpenter, and Mason collaboration!

ascendancy_town_tier_quest.title: 마을을 위한 퀘스트
ascendancy_town_tier_quest.text: 아래의 마을 요구 사항을 충족시켜 주세요.

bulletin_message.000: 어센던시의 영부인이신 데니아 공주님의 명에 따라 왔습니다. 당신의 정착에 우리 모두가 번영할 수 있는 지혜를 주는 풍요의 교회의 축복과 함께 하길 바라십니다.
왕실의 장신은 그 탁월함에 존경의 눈빛을 받게 될 것입니다. 당신의 석공은 그들의 엄격한 기준에 따라 동상을 만들 것입니다. 그리고 그들에게 감명을 주는 특별한 사람 중 1명이 될 것입니다.
만약 당신이 정착에 완전히 성공한다면 권리, 특권 그리고 보상과 함께 공식적인 어센던시 마을로 인정받을 것입니다.
실제로 무엇을 의미할까요? 글쎄요... 주로 장부에 작성하는데, 그렇게 되면 우리가 다시 돌아와서 세금을 징수할 것이란걸 기억해주세요.
물론입니다! 공주님의 명에 따라 자격이 있는 마을은 교육 학습의 기회와 캐러밴을 통한 거래로 부유함을 얻을 수 있습니다.
시드의 명령을 받기위해 당신은 용기와 용맹함을 보여야만 합니다! 나는 당신의 석공에게 제작법을 줄 것입니다. 당신의 상징적인 기념비를 만들기 위한 재료를 찾아 떠나세요.
아주 좋습니다! Messire Burlyhands가 당신이 여기 있을 거라고 했는데 아슬아슬했군요. 바로 시작해볼까요?
무력을 통한 영광, 교회와 함께하는 친절, 장인으로서의 인정이 있습니다. 이 3가지 중 하나의 방법으로 마을의 발전을 충분히 입증시키면 됩니다. 당신에게 가장 흥미로운 것은 어떤 것인가요?
농담이야! 왕실의 회계사들은 대관식 뿐 아니라 모든 것들을 지금 꽉 잡고 있거든. 어쨋든, 마을의 지위가 높아질수록 많은 보상과 혜택을 얻는 것을 의미해.
풍요의 교회는 어려운 자들과 함께 살아가는 그들의 편에 설 것입니다. 당신의 석공과 요리사에게 제작법을 가르쳐 드리겠습니다. 그리고 풍요의 분수를 짓고 당신의 업적을 기념하며 돌아갈 것입니다.
안녕하십니까! [str(i18n_data.town_name)]이(가) 새로운 정착지인가요?  Messire Burlyhands가 당신이 여기 있을 거라고 했는데 아슬아슬했군요. 선언문부터 시작할까요?

좋은 선택입니다! 기념비 뿐 아니라 당신의 마을은 확실히 부를 축적해 나갈 것입니다. I shall leave the requirements with you, should you wish to consult with them again, or should a different path come to appeal more than your initial chosen road.
[str(i18n_data.town_name)]에 시드의 관대함이 함께하길 빌겠습니다. 성장을 평가하기 위해 나를 불러야 하니 당신에게 새 한마리를 주고 떠나겠습니다!

returning_collector_encounter.title: A explorer approaches your town.
returning_collector_encounter.trade_details: Hello [str(i18n_data.town_name)]! I am an explorer from far to the east who deals in various amounts of trade and collection. Recently I found [str(i18n_data.reward_number)] [str(i18n_data.reward_item)] just sitting next to the road. I'm not sure who left them there, but they're quite helpful at cleaning up! I don't have much use for them myself, but a nearby village said they are in need of [str(i18n_data.want_number)] [str(i18n_data.want_item)]. I will be relaxing nearby for [str(i18n_data.num_days)] days.. would you be interested in a trade at that time?
returning_collector_encounter.waiting_title: The explorer will be back in [str(i18n_data.hour_counter)] [str(i18n_data.period)]!
returning_collector_encounter.waiting_text: The explorer will be back in [str(i18n_data.hour_counter)] [str(i18n_data.period)] to give you [str(i18n_data.reward_number)] [str(i18n_data.reward_item)] if you have [str(i18n_data.want_number)] [str(i18n_data.want_item)] ready for them!
returning_collector_encounter.return_greetings_positive: I'm back! It looks like you've made me the [str(i18n_data.want_number)] [str(i18n_data.want_item)] I asked for. Are you still interested in [str(i18n_data.reward_number)] [str(i18n_data.reward_item)] in exchange? I assure you, they are more useful than any normal person at carrying things!
returning_collector_encounter.return_greetings_negative: I'm back, but it doesn't look like you've got the [str(i18n_data.want_number)] [str(i18n_data.want_item)] I asked for. Oh well, maybe someone back at my village can find a use for them.

bulletin_message.000: 용맹한 마을이여, 두려운가? 족장이라 불리는 오고가 곧 올 것이다. 당신을 위하여.

erdene_appears.bulletin_title: 당신의 불 옆에서 쉬쉬 거리는 소리가 나기 시작했다.

bulletin_message.000: To borrow strength to rise means to fall when strength fails. Ogo borrows his power not from his so-called-sayer, but from the babe he stole.
저요? 저는 그저 지켜보는 사람입니다. 당신을. 그를. 별들을. 운명을...
bulletin_message.001: 전 레드 클린 중 한 명입니다. 당신의 시드 대신에 저희가 구원자가 되려고 합니다. 그래서 지금은 저희가 보고 있죠. 그리고 당신의 별이 떠오를 날을 기다리겠습니다.
bulletin_message.002: Me! I suppose you've earned your bit. I am an ember in the forge, a spark in the air. I watch, so that I may know when it is time for the fire to engulf us all.
bulletin_message.003: 저요? 오늘은 아무 일도 일어나지 않았네요. 만약 내일도 살아있다면 레드 클린의 에어딘을 불러주세요.

bulletin_message.000: 작은 마을이여, 열심히 싸워라. 운명은 무의미하다. 하지만 그렇지 않다면, 당신들은 떠오를 것이다.

Upon this paper, you shall find the lullabye to sooth the Mountain's soul. Find a stolen flute. Bid your wood-worker pitch it to this melody. Grant it to your bravest sheep-singer, set him at Ogo's great mammoth, and watch self-importance meet it's just reward.
좋아. 작은 마을이여, 열심히 싸워라
Soothsayer magic! Speak with old ones! Tell future! He see... he see Red Kiln Falling, new star rising. That star is Ogo. This time, we pick winning side!
bulletin_message.001: Soothsayer old, old snake. Speaks out with bones and scales. Sees future! Sees cycle ending, ending forever. Not sure what he mean, but good for Ogo!
bulletin_message.002: Soothsayer goblin, obviously! Goblin who can see future! He say old ones dying away, new star rising. Good for Ogo, bad for everyone else, you included!

bulletin_message.000: 호, 작은 마을이군! 너에게 나쁜 소식을 전하기 위해 왔다!
bulletin_message.001: 보잘 것 없는 마을이군! 엎드려 공포에 떨어라!
bulletin_message.002: 무하하하하하하! 이게? 이게 당신 마을이야? 눈물 나도록 웃기군!

snooty_introduction.bulletin_title: A goblin with a officious smirk slithers into town

bulletin_message.000: By order of Ogo Skullbonker, Goblin-All-Chief-To-Be, you and all your stuffs now be tribute to Great Glittering Army and Red Kiln Empire!
bulletin_message.001: I envoy of Ogo Skullbonker, tamer of Mountains! Ogo demand many thing from all, include you, include your gold!
bulletin_message.002: My Chief-of-Chiefs, Ogo Skullbonker, soon rule take Glittering Army and rule all of Red Kiln! You next of many conquests. You become our goldfarmers!
bulletin_message.003: I am Bannergoblin of Ogo Skullbonker, rider of Mountain! My master demand you tribute, in form of all you have! You give everything! Or you pay!
bulletin_message.004: 나는 오고 스컬본커의 기수다! 너가 우리의 족장을 돕는다면 오고의 눈은 너를 바라볼 것이다! 그리고 오고의 눈은 모든 것을 안다! 공물을 바쳐라, 아니면 눈은 너의 종말을 볼 것이다!

bulletin_message.000: 예언자는 오고 스컬본커가 영웅 중의 영웅이 될 것이라고 말한다! 그리고 너는 황금을 바칠 운명이다!
bulletin_message.001: Soothsayer little, but have big thoughts! Soothsayer never wrong. Soothsayer say you give Ogo gold, or Ogo will take it from you!
bulletin_message.002: Goblins long be shunned and forgotten. Soothsayer say that Ogo Skullbonker, my LittleChief, will soon change everything! For that, he need gold and labor!
bulletin_message.003: Ogo Skullbonker, Master of Masters, have great destiny, to rule over all! Soothsayer say so; soothsayer never wrong. Soothsayer say, you will help!

bulletin_message.000: Anyway, it matter not! I here only to warn you: muster your gold, so it easy for us to collect! We be back soon!
bulletin_message.001: Hahaha! Whatever. You all belong to us now. We come soon to collect you for gold mines!
bulletin_message.002: Oh, you say something? No matter, we return soon! Collect all your things so will be easy for us to move!
bulletin_message.003: 어쨋든, 돌아갈 시간이 됐군. 곧 다시 돌아오겠다! 준비하고 있어라, 알겠나? 고블린 아래에서의 새 삶을 기대해라!

bulletin_message.000: Good news for you, pathetic humans! Ogo Skullbonker, Chief-of-Chiefs-To-Be, calls us to home for clan meet-meet. Been fun hanging with you! Maybe we tell friends, back soon for more fun taking your stuff!
bulletin_message.001: Humans no challenge. So sad. We hope to return home to our Chief-of-Chiefs, Ogo Skullbonker, with story of our glory, but there is no glory in defeating you. Maybe we come back when you stronger.
bulletin_message.002: We leaving now, humans. But we will be back.
bulletin_message.003: Well, was fun preying on you, pathetic humans! But fun times must end, we go home now to big clan meet-meet. While we gone, build more stuff, so when we come back, we can take more!

bulletin_message.000: 하하하! 정확해. 우리의 우정을 기억하기 위한거야.

loot_final.bulletin_title: The goblin places something on the ground with great care

bulletin_message.000: You so funny. Because we friends, me tell you: Ogo pretty cool. A bit mean. Once ate a puppy. But... soothsayer say he fated! Meant to stomp on everyone! Me just little guy, you know? Though you littler. Anyways.
Good news peons! Ogo Skullbonker, Chief-of-Chiefs-To-Be, calls us back to him. Time to go home, show him tribute! If you lucky, maybe we be back to visit... soon!

bulletin_message.00: 꽤 조용하군. 그런데 당신은 알고 있나요...? 새들이 노래 부르는 것을 그만두는 것은 나쁜 징조라는 것을요.
제 생각에는 늑대인 것 같아요. 고블린 늑대요. 당신의 경계를 잘 관찰하세요. 그들을 흥분시켜서는 안됩니다. 벙커로 숨으세요. 만약 도망가길 원한다면 그렇게 하세요. 아주 좋은 방법이죠! 내일을 위해 도망가는 것은 결코 부끄러운 일이 아니예요.
안녕하세요! 지낼만하신가요?

bulletin_message.000: --당신을 지켜보고 있는 사람으로부터
만약 늑대들이 당신을 해치우려 하기 전에 이 문제를 해결하고 싶다면, 먼저 공격하세요.
bulletin_message.001: 그들은 숲에 있어요. 고블린 늑대들이요. 그들이 당신을 찾기 전에 당신이 먼저 찾으세요.
bulletin_message.002: 그들이 움직이고 있어요. 당신의 숲에 늑대들이 있어요.
bulletin_message.003: 사람들의 작은 캠프 : 그들이 아직 자는동안 적을 찾아내세요.
bulletin_message.004: 고블린 늑대들은 명령에 따라 공격받도록 훈련되어있습니다. 그 명령을 내리기 전에 그들을 자유롭게 해준다면, 당신은 아주 편안한 밤을 보낼 수 있겠죠.

bulletin_message.000: 숲에 늑대가 나타났습니다! 아직은 도망갈 수 있어요!
bulletin_message.001: 그들의 울음소리가 들리세요? 숲에 고블린 늑대들이 있어요!
bulletin_message.002: 우리 그룹이 고블린에게 공격받고 있어요! 도망치세요!
bulletin_message.003: 이 고블린 늑대들은 평범한 늑대들이 아닌 것 같아요--그들은 빠르고 잔인하며 두려움이 없어요! 최대한 도망치세요!
bulletin_message.004: 당신의 숲에 고블린들이 있어요! 그들이 공격하기 전에 안전한 곳으로 숨으세요!

msg1.bulletin_title: 피난민이 숨을 헐떡이며 지평선 위에 나타났다.

bulletin_message.00: 만약 당신이 걱정하고 있는 것이 있다면 축하드릴 일이 있습니다. 제가 이 근처를 여기저기 돌아다녔는데 고블린 무리들을 못 본 것 같아요. 당신을 공격하려는 몬스터들을 보지 못할 것이라는 말이 아니라 아주 좋은 일이라는 것입니다.
이웃 마을로부터 수집해온 선물이 있어요. 오늘 밤 모두가 당신 덕분에 쉽게 잠을 잘수 있을꺼예요.
안녕하세요? 집에 아무도 없나요?
내 양에게 말해줘요... 나의 사랑은 언제나 당신이었다고...
넌 이기지 않았어. 오고는... 다시 온다. 예언자는 말했다... 오고는... 모두를 부숴버릴꺼라고...
으... 다쳤어...

bulletin_message.000: Hahaha!! Your puny settlement now part of Glittering Territory! I deserve tribute of shinies!
bulletin_message.001: Human Peons! You no understand the might of the Glittering Army! You lucky to bow before me. Also, want some things to hold to at night; to sing me to sleep.
bulletin_message.002: 가진거 있어? 우리가 가진다. 우리는 좋다! 이해하지?
bulletin_message.003: 하하하, 위대한 붉은 영토의 새로운 꼬마군. 난 너의 점심을 뺏어먹을꺼야. 우릴 위해 만들어줘야게어. 아님 다른 것들이라도.
bulletin_message.004: You dumb bok, me big Glittering Chieftain! Natural order mean you give me stuff and I no dees-tro-i you. Me want supplies. Understand?

shakedown.bulletin_title: A goblin with a fancy hat swaggers into town

bulletin_message.000: 찬란한 군이 돌아왔다! 조공은 어딨지?
bulletin_message.001: 내꺼! 어딨어?
bulletin_message.002: 우리가 돌아왔다. 이제 조공을 바칠 시간이다. 어딨지?
bulletin_message.003: Me dreamed last night. In dream, you make me stuff; we like brothers only me no kill you. Got Stuff?
bulletin_message.004: Want stuff now. You make? We good! You no make? You die. We all friends!

bulletin_message.000: 조공을 까먹었어? 만들지 않았다고? 찬란한 군의 명예를 더럽히는군! 죽을 준비나 해라!
bulletin_message.001: You dumb boks no make my stuff?! Dooooom!!! DOOM TO ALL!!!
bulletin_message.002: What? You no have my stuff? BLOOD, STABBITY, AND VEN-JENCE!
bulletin_message.003: Me want to be good chieftan. Me want to be friends! But you no listen. No. You no worthy. Me must kill you, then go home. Cry for could-have-been. You cry too, except you dead.

collection_failed.bulletin_title: The goblin frowns so hard you can't see his eyes

bulletin_message.000: 맞아. 너가 협력만 한다면 좋게 해결될거야.
bulletin_message.001: You actually have stuff? I never--I mean, yes. You give me due.
bulletin_message.002: 가진거 있어? 우리가 가진다. 우리는 좋다!
bulletin_message.004: My stuff! I take home now and cuddle to sleep at night.
bulletin_message.005: Hahahahaha!!! Pretty stuff!! Beautiful stuff!! Mine mine mine!
bulletin_message.006: Stuff!! Me sheep be so happy.
bulletin_message.007: My stuff! Hahahah, you pretty good for peon. Be back soon!

collection_success.bulletin_title: The goblin grins like a kid on Frostfeast

bulletin_message.000: Me back soon for stuff. Better have it, or no good for you, little hearthling.
What? You say no? Then we take! TAKE ALL THINGS!!!!
bulletin_message.001: No no no. You supposed to say 'Yes.' You supposed to feel grateful! Try again? No? Bad! Me fix badness!
bulletin_message.002: 싫다고? 날 화나게 만드는군! 널 부숴버리겠어!
bulletin_message.004: You no understand. Alternative: Death. Deeeaaaattth. DEAAATTTTTHHH!!!

sighted_bulletin.title: A thief!
sighted_bulletin.message: Shhhh, you're not supposed to be able to see him.

trainer.description: Whips the wolves into a dangerous frenzy

ogo.description: Soothsayer say, Ogo Chosen One, Ogo Cycle-Breaker

bulletin_message.000: Well done, little town. You survive another night. Ogo, his mountain, and his soothsayer are disappeared from the earth, but you remain. Do you celebrate?
My Khan calls me home. Fare well, little town. To every equal, another day dawns.
Of lumber born and southstar driven, grew nest of hope in mountains riven
My Khan has seen many years. He is ill. When his star falls, his men will look to the wilds, to grow their honor. Ogo's onus will pass to you, and they will come.
Oh heroes come, and heroes go, but forever's found in the campfire's glow
The wink of the gem in the monkey's paw, the rebirth of the star the Gods foresaw
To the great, come the challenges of the great. Power seeks power. To defeat power... is to invite the attention of more.

Who can say? My people believe... well. It does not matter now. The cycles of the gods are not for the everyday considerations of men, lizardkin, monkey's folk or otherwise. Look to your tomorrow, little town, and prosper.
Cast the bones, Ogo's soothsayer did, over the cradle of this land. Would you hear his words?
Music remind Mountain of warm, safe place. Of food and fire. Me give you this to say thank you.
Ogo can you not hear the chimes? Like old memory! Me no want to fight anymore.

mountain_notices.bulletin_title: Mountain the Ogre lifts his head to listen

bulletin_message.000: 오고?
오고? 넌 오고를 죽였어!!! 마운틴의 친구를 기억하기 위해 노래를 불러라!!!
Mountain! Fight... on....

ogo_death_2.bulletin_title: Ogo Skullbonker falls to the ground

bulletin_message.000: What? Ogo Skullbonker, defeated? What soothsayer say? What Mountain say? What about Khan? What about... next cycle?

ogo_death_1.bulletin_title: Ogo Skullbonker falls to the ground

bulletin_message.000: Mountain, ridiculous! This is war! For shinies! Forward!!!
See Mountain? They refuse your offer of peace! Renewed attack!

renewed_attack.bulletin_title: Ogo raises his fist in triumph

bulletin_message.000: Ogo can you not hear the chimes? Like old memory! Me no want to fight anymore.

mountain_replies.bulletin_title: Mountain lifts his head to listen

bulletin_message.000: Arghhh!!! But the shinies! Fine. Mountain my friend; me no go where he no go. Your town safe... for now. We return when Khan is well!

ogo_relents.bulletin_title: Ogo stomps his foot in frustration

bulletin_message.000: 마운틴, 왜 그만 싸우고 싶어?

ogo_notices.bulletin_title: Ogo Skullbonker waves to get his ogre's attention

bulletin_message.000: No. Me no want to fight anymore. What about you, little people? If me no feel like fighting, what you do?
What? Human town dare display goblin honor token?! Retributioooooonnnn!!!!

sighted_bulletin.title: Goblins come to reclaim their honor tokens!

bulletin_message.000: 모든것을 가져가라!!
마침내, 우리는 위대한 빛나는 자들의 자리에 서게 되었다!! 나아가라, 내 부하들이여!! 오고 스컬본커의 영광을 위해 나아가라!
오고를 위하여! 샤이니를 위하여!!

thiefs.description: Yearns for a life of comfort

bulletin_message.000: Will you not release the children of the forest? They do not belong in your crates and piles of trinkets. Your compliance will be rewarded.
bulletin_message.001: Hundreds of great oaks and junipers have been cut down to satiate the greed of humans. Our patience wears thin. I ask of you, return them to the homeland.
bulletin_message.002: Return our logs and help restore the natural balance of the great woodlands. I cannot guarantee your safetey if you refuse.
bulletin_message.003: Our wilderness has been sacrificed for your lifestyle of excess. We will give you a chance to return our logs. I suggest you heed my warning..

bulletin_message.000: I am deeply disappointed.. I would suggest you prepare yourselves. The minions of the forest speak of an invasion.
Thank you for your cooperation.. In return, I will give you [str(i18n_data.reward_gold_amount)] gold coins and [str(i18n_data.reward_item_count)] [str(i18n_data.reward_item_name)].
Greetings, humans of [str(i18n_data.town_name)]. I have come to warn you of the growing unrest within these forests.
bulletin_message.001: Silently, we have been watching.. since even before the fall of Firebird. Why? To protect. Our trees. Our saplings. Our woods.

bulletin_message.000: We will be taking these back.

revenge.bulletin_title: A horde of entlings escape with your logs!

bulletin_message.000: Here, take this as a token of our gratitude.

simple_message.bulletin_title: Entlings carrying loot scurry toward you

bulletin_message.00: The Red Kiln believes that advancement can only come from conflict between equals. Khan is no longer. And where one falls, those stronger and more cunning will rise.
You there. Erdene told me of you. She said you defeated Ogo Skullbonker.

msg1.bulletin_title: An orcish warchief approaches your town

bulletin_message.00: The age of this Khan is over, but new light seeps from the horizon. We do as Cid bade and respect the mark of the Four Colors. Place a Scout Gong, smelted by your metal worker, in your territory to mark your readiness for battle.
Now that I am here, I see you are not yet worthy to face even the least of my camp chiefs. In your eyes flame not the lust for mastery!
왜냐고? 위대하신 여신 쿨가나에게 바칠 것이다! 삶이 끝난 뒤 많은 부를 가져다 주지. 이제 알았으니 보물을 내놔!

bulletin_message.000: 보물을 안 주겠다고?! 빼았자!!!
bulletin_message.001: 하하하, 당신을 테스트해보겠어! 물론 우린 빼앗고도 남을만큼 힘이 세지!
bulletin_message.002: 금을 다 빼앗을 것이다! 모자를 빼앗아간 것에 대한 복수다!!

bulletin_message.000: 그랴!! 눈치챘나?
bulletin_message.001: 오 눈부셔! 공이군! 에메랄드가 박혀있어!

msg1.bulletin_title: 코볼드가 당신의 금 더미들을 노려보고 있다.

bulletin_message.000: 우리는 당신의 비축소나 상자에 많은 보물이 있는걸 봤다. 우리는 매우 매우 많은 약탈품을 원한다. 우리한테 좀 나눠줘라, 알겠지?

bulletin_message.00: 우린... 너무 약해.. Put out Elite Gong if you dares..

msg1.bulletin_title: 코볼드 정찰병이 땅 위에서 훌쩍 거리며 운다.

bulletin_message.00: We contractors. We make camp. Orc pay us. Those orc obsess with honor, politics, new Khan. Soon enough, they send orc army here and we need clean up again.
You recognize? ...No, me don't know you. You saying us all look same?!

msg1.bulletin_title: Some familiar looking goblins begin building huts near your town

bulletin_message.000: You lucky us busy! What we doing? We building huts. Set up camp.
bulletin_message.001: ....We busy, so we ignore and go back to setting up camp.

bulletin_message.000: Oh! Me think of great idea! You pay us instead and we make so no orc come! You just need give us some few treasures. You win, me win, both win.

shakedown.bulletin_title: The goblin's beady little eyes light up

bulletin_message.000: We backs! Where is our shiny loots??

collection_due.bulletin_title: A pack of goblins lazily slog into back into town

bulletin_message.000: What? You change mind? ... You humans so inconsiderate of our time. Now we need call back dumb bok orcs and take pay cut.
bulletin_message.001: No has?? We has family you knows! You waste our time! We tell orcs give you no mercy!

bulletin_message.000: Shinies! Supplies! Maybe this job even better than work for Chieftain. Thanks, human. If you up to it, put out red Master Gong. Ogre take red token as challenge.
bulletin_message.001: You that scared of orc boks? Well, good for me! Don't put out red Gong or even bigger, dumber boks might come.
bulletin_message.002: Stuffs!! You should hire we full-time. You ask what we do for you? ..We can discuss in contract. Maybe you need us if you display Master Gong and giant ogre bok come.
bulletin_message.003: You give good stuffs! Me wolf will be so happy! Have you met ogre chief yet? They like color red. Like on Gong. Ask you blacksmith.

collection_success.bulletin_title: The goblin flashes a toothy grin

bulletin_message.000: You agree pay? Good, make us life easier. We come back later for stuffs. We take nap now...
You no want pay? Ok. Make little difference for us. Watch, for orc army come soon.

bulletin_message.00: Your precious Cid Treaty can't protect you now, foolish humans!
Puny town! You mount mark of Ruby! You dare challenge me, Chief Grut Bashbrain?!
Don't get arrogant puny humans! Brethren from Capitol await to test their might. Any town bearing the General's Gong will not be unheeded!

msg1.bulletin_title: The ogre chief shakes his fist angrily

bulletin_message.00: That being said, we too are not to be underestimated. We have fought more beasts and creatures than your settlement could even conceive of. I look forward to our fight.
So long it has been since we have seen the Purple Glimmer of a General's token. The Red Kiln would stand to benefit from fighting more foes such as yourself.

msg1.bulletin_title: A troop of orcs walk towards you in perfect synchrony

bulletin_message.00: For us, there are many roads for advancement. This is but one, yet fruitful in itself.

Perhaps you would not understand what fortuity this experience has given us, in this period of political upheaval. But that matters not. The Warchief will wish to meet you again. For now, I bid you well, human.
I commend you on your victory. You have proven yourself a skilled and honorable foe.

msg1.bulletin_title: The orc respectfully bows at the outcome of the battle

bulletin_message.00: The defeat of my chiefs and warriors demands from us recognition of your strength. Let us contend in battle and the greater of equals shall come forth with honor and valiance.
As I predicted, fate brings us together once more.

msg1.bulletin_title: Warchief Oghar Norwind strides towards you with fearless bravado

bulletin_message.00: I now return home. Word comes to me that, bereft of our Khan's wisdom, our shaman have delved into dark things, long forgotten. They think the mistakes of the past do not apply to them, and I fear for what they may do.

I now return home. Word comes to me that bereft of our Khan's wisdom, our shaman have delved too far into dark, unknowable things. Nonetheless, if you ever wish to spar again and improve your skills, put out any gong of the Four Colors and we will gladly return to meet your challenge.
Erdene was right about you. You are a worthy opponent indead. We will not forget the strength that you have helped us gain.

unlock_blue_token_recipe.bulletin_title: 대장장이가 장식용 엘리트 공 제조법을 얻었다!

unlock_purple_token_recipe.bulletin_title: 대장장이가 장군의 금빛 공 제조법을 얻었다!

unlock_red_token_recipe.bulletin_title: 대장장이가 장식용 마스터 공 제조법을 얻었다!

bulletin_message.00:
O-oh... how did you? Never mind, it matters not. I shall return to my people with the news that the Titanous scourge can be defeated. This may be what tips events in our favor, away from the treasonous shaman.

My deepest thanks to you, on behalf of my late Khan.

story2.dialog_title: Erdene, Speaker of the Red Kiln

bulletin_message.00:
I had come to warn you of the Titan lurking under your lands... to beseech your help in eradicating it, but...

...did you already cleanse this land of its sinister presence?

story1.choice_000: Oh, yeah, we got rid of it a while ago.

bulletin_message.00: Valiant humans, who have proven your strength, I greet you now as equals. This domain is yours by right, and your star glints all the brighter. Yours is a promising fortune indeed!

greet.bulletin_title: Erdene of the Red Kiln returns, anxious
greet.dialog_title: Erdene, Speaker of the Red Kiln

bulletin_message.00: I come with a request of the utmost urgence, there is... wait...

intro.dialog_title: Erdene, Speaker of the Red Kiln

bulletin_message.00:
My request of you: A fragment of the evil that brought low the Phoenix Empire has coalesced here, beneath your feet.

Left unchallenged, it will sleep for generations yet, growing in strength, stifling and corrupting the magic of this land.

Awaken this Titan now, though, and it will have no choice but to expend its gathered energy in a final battle against your settlement. Withstand its wrath, and it will be snuffed out for good, and your descendants will live in peace.

My shamans devised this Gong - take it and place it. When you are prepared, let it ring aloud, and it will rouse the slumbering Titan.

You will be beset by horrors for days, perhaps weeks - but a fragmented evil cannot sustain itself. Outlast. Strike at its minions, dig up its roots, drive off its tendrils. Every small victory will weaken it.

Persevere, and the Titan will fall, and a small part of the calamity of the Phoenix Empire finally undone.

Be an example for my people that this evil can be faced and destroyed - that we need not enslave ourselves to it. Please.

accept1.dialog_title: Erdene, Speaker of the Red Kiln

bulletin_message.00:
Below is wrong. Snake knows this. Rabbit knows this. Monkey knows this, too. But, power seeks power.

The Phoenix, they found whispers of power below. They dug with picks and found clues, they dug with minds and found knowledge.

Knowledge without wisdom is peril.

story2.dialog_title: Erdene, Speaker of the Red Kiln

bulletin_message.00:
Farewell, brave Humans. May your star shine ever brighter, and be a guide to all through the coming night.

[You can find the Gong lying near your Banner, or in your inventory under 'Decorations']

farewell.dialog_title: Erdene, Speaker of the Red Kiln

bulletin_message.00:
It is a tale passed from Speaker to Speaker, of when Monkey first rose to prominence. From Monkey came humans, and those humans united.

They built an Empire, spreading from the center outwards until it encompassed the entire continent. As their grand central capital stretched up into the sky, the humans’ ambition led them below...

story1.dialog_title: Erdene, Speaker of the Red Kiln

bulletin_message.00:
No, I suppose not. The Titan will stay asleep for generations, your settlement is not at risk.

Perhaps I was wrong to burden you with a task that is rightfully mine. My apologies. I withdraw now, to tend to my own people.

I will leave behind this specially-prepared Gong - in the event you change your mind, simply place it and you shall be further enlightened.

Farewell, humans.

In time, the darkness subsided, but now it saturates the earth, whispering to those who will listen. We Orcs tested your town’s strength not just for glory, but to prove that you have the will to resist this evil and its corruption.

Although, without a Khan to guide them, the shaman of the Red Kiln now seek to re-form this titanic evil, to control it.

I must stop them - it was my Khan’s last wish. But, this is for me and my kind to do.

Of you, I ask a favor.

story5.dialog_title: Erdene, Speaker of the Red Kiln

bulletin_message.00: Valiant humans, who have proven your strength, I greet you now as equals. This domain is yours by right, and your star glints all the brighter. Yours is a promising fortune indeed!

greet.bulletin_title: Erdene of the Red Kiln returns, anxious
greet.dialog_title: Erdene, Speaker of the Red Kiln

bulletin_message.00:
Humans fled, receding to the edges of the world, and held on by their very fingertips until the darkness quieted itself.

Orcs, like all of Snake’s children, stayed and fought. Fought the corrupted, fought through famine and hardship. Whether through noble courage or foolish pride, I know not.

The Rabbits, already in decline, burrowed deep, forsaking the surface world.

story4.dialog_title: Erdene, Speaker of the Red Kiln

bulletin_message.00:
A great evil was awakened, this we know. The capital was lost, obliterated, and the world surely doomed. But, there was some hero, some sacrifice, lost to time. It was enough. Not enough to destroy the evil, but enough to break it apart.

It dissipated like fog across the land, turning the forces of nature against its inhabitants, withering crops and fraying minds.

story3.dialog_title: Erdene, Speaker of the Red Kiln

bulletin_message.00:
I… come also with a request. I fear for my people.

Have you heard of the Phoenix Empire? Of its end?

intro.dialog_title: Erdene, Speaker of the Red Kiln

bulletin_message.00:
[Select the Gong and Press the 'Awaken Titan' button when you're ready. Killing or destroying the Titan's minions, tentacles, and roots will all reduce its health.]

[Good luck!]

msg2.bulletin_title: A scrawled note, attached to the Sinister Gong

bulletin_message.00:
Only sound this gong when prepared - your town will be cut off from the world for days.

Corrupted creatures will surely appear - face them in combat if you can, hole up and hide if you cannot. There is no shame in survival. Be vigilant for citizens being trapped, buildings being threatened, and be prepared to dig.

Every small victory will sap away the Titan's strength - attempt no direct attack, it is out of reach and a mere apparition.

Stand strong in driving away its corruption, and you will emerge victorious.

msg1.bulletin_title: A scrawled note, attached to the Sinister Gong

bulletin_message.00:
Excellent! We Orcs aren't quite as talented in the crafts as you are, but my disciple has proven themselves a fierce warrior, and I'm sure they will make themselves useful however else they can!

Farewell, brave Humans, until a future day has dawned!

accept2.dialog_title: Erdene, Speaker of the Red Kiln

bulletin_message.00:
I should add... due to your exceptional bravery, some of my people have gone beyond simply respecting you as Humans, to now truly consider you as Orc.

Some even wish to emmigrate and become members of your tribe.

request1.choice_000: Orcs want to join my town?

bulletin_message.00: Wonderful! So, this Orc disciple may join your tribe?

accept1.dialog_title: Erdene, Speaker of the Red Kiln

bulletin_message.00:
Very well. The news is sure to disappoint my disciple, but your tribe and its wishes deserve our utmost respect.

Farewell, brave Humans, until another day has dawned.

reject2.dialog_title: Erdene, Speaker of the Red Kiln

bulletin_message.00:
By the Khan's blessed name, you've done it!

I came as quickly as I could - I could feel the change in the winds even from the Red Kiln territories.

greet.bulletin_title: Erdene of the Red Kiln returns, joyous
greet.dialog_title: Erdene, Speaker of the Red Kiln

bulletin_message.00:
Oh, I see... and I understand. If I were standing in your stead, I could not so easily accept a Human into the ranks of the Red Kiln, either.

That said, are you sure my disciple does not have a place here?

reject1.dialog_title: Erdene, Speaker of the Red Kiln

bulletin_message.00:
Yes! In fact, the Titan's defeat has cleansed that sinister Gong I brought you, along with your lands. That Gong shall stand as testament of my people's enduring respect for your tribe and its people.

So long as that white stone Gong is deployed and you have room for us, expect an Orcish immigrant every few moons.

In fact, one of my most loyal disciples has come along with me. They are quite insistent about joining your tribe. In truth, I lament them leaving my side, but cannot begrudge their wishes.

What say you? Will you accept this humble Orc into your township this day?

Your defeat of this sinister presence may be what tips events in our favor, and away from that of the treasonous shamans.

My deepest thanks to you, on behalf of my late Khan. I shall return to my people carrying the news that the Titanous scourge can, truly, be defeated.

intro.dialog_title: Erdene, Speaker of the Red Kiln
intro.choice_000: I'm glad we could do some good

bulletin_message.00:
Would you like to let this Orc to join your town?

[They're strong, slow, and surprisingly hard to startle and fast to regenerate despite their low Spirit]

msg1.dialog_title: An Orc wishes to join your town!

grant_recurring_orc_citizen.notification_title: A new Orc citizen has joined your town!

grant_orc_citizen.notification_title: Erdene's disciple has joined your town!

bulletin_message.00: For instance, a Hearth of Cheer is for those who believe that a town's value is found in being a happy home for its citizens.
A Hearth of Makers, on the other hand, is for those who believe that a town's value is its work, and that its work is best measured in gold.
Kind greetings! At last, I can see your Settlement in person. You've developed even faster than I anticipated, you should all be proud!

intro.choice_001: [skip] We know what Hearth we want.

bulletin_message.00: Finally, a Hearth of Glory is for those who believe their destiny is to stand strong in a hostile world, as the Knight Cid did at the founding of the Ascendancy.
Cheer, Glory, or Makers - the choice is entirely yours. Envision what your Town will one day be, and follow that beacon into the future!

I came out personally to help you on your last step towards being a true Settlement of the Ascendancy!

You've grown large enough now that it's time to choose what Hearth shall represent your town, as is tradition.

Indeed, Hearths have served as shining beacons for Towns all the way back to the Phoenix Empire.

Their glow attracts settlers and prosperity, and the particular qualities of a chosen Hearth reflect where a Town finds its value.

hearth_upgrade_cheer.reward_message: By unanimous agreement of the citizens, we declare:
hearth_upgrade_cheer.reward_message_ctd: to be a settlement out to prove that it has the happiest, most well-fed citizens, and nice places for them to live.

achievements.000: Daily Update boosted by citizen Morale

bulletin_message.00: Kind greetings! My name is Ember Minton, and I am a missionary for the Church of Plenty. We would be delighted to have a settlement such as yours count among one of our Townships.

I'm Marak Azael, nice to meet you. It tickles my whiskers to see a settlement like yours, assembled from nothing in no time at all.

The very Ascendancy itself was built with saw and hammer by fine craftsfolk like yourselves! That's why the Guild means so much to me, and why I wanted to pay you a visit.

So! Now you've met the folks that tagged along with me - I'm impartial, here, so it's up to you to decide who you want as a Sponsor. I can say that they're all good choices, though!

I'm going to show them around town a little, but I'll leave the plans for each of their fountains and shrines and whatnot with your Masons.

Good to see you all again! I'll see you at the dedication ceremony for whichever you end up picking!

A Township dedicated to Cid's valorous example can serve as an anchor for a whole region, and embolden new settlers to forge their own new Outposts.

If you would choose to build a memorial to Cid, the Guard would be happy to share some of our knowledge of arms with you as part of the dedication ceremony.

Dedicating the Valor of Cid will grant you recipes for new, highest-tier weapons.

It is the Church's adage that 'Fortune favors the kind', and blessed fountains of Plenty are truly a blessing to the mind, body, and spirit of a Town's citizens.

Please consider showing the world that your Town will be one of kindness by building a shrine of the Church's design.

Dedicating a Fountain of Plenty will grant all of your townsfolk a +1 boost to the Mind, Body, and Spirit attributes.

Hello - I am Anwyn Torresi, Captain of Her Majesty's guard. She sends me with Her thanks for settling this untamed land, and for guarding it against animals and monsters alike.

We in the Guard follow the example of the Knight Cid, believing that standing brave and resolute against the wilderness is the only way for the Ascendancy to reclaim this lost land.

You have done the Ascendancy a great service by planting your Banner here.

The Crafters Guild! We believe that the skill of an artisan must be respected, and their works celebrated.

We at the Guild would love to sanction this Township as one fit to pursue mastery in crafts - and, after all, only we can truly know masterwork when we see it!

Dedicating a tribute to the Guildmaster's Skill will grant the ability to create Masterwork-quality furniture and decorations, which are considerably better than those of Excellent quality.

Hello again, [str(i18n_data.town_name)]! Glad to see you all still going strong - not that I expected any different!

In fact, I've brought some folks along with me this time - I'll let them introduce themselves and tell you why they've come.

As he should be! With fine crafters like them, your town will be churning out Masterworks in no time! I'll be keeping an eye out for a [str(i18n_data.town_name)] maker's mark in the Capital market in a few months!

Your homes all look pretty sturdy, too, come to think of it. My compliments to your Workers, they seem to know how to put things together, too!

Anyway, I'll let you get back to celebrating! I'm going to go hunt down a pint of something strong and a bowl of something hearty!

Remember, busy hands make a happy Town!

msg3.dialog_title: Marak claps you on the back

bulletin_message.00: Ha ha ha! What a fine monument you've built! Level, square, and all the finishing touches that only a trained eye such as mine could truly appreciate!</br></br><font size=-1>Huh, how'd you get it to glow like that, though?</font>

msg1.choice_000: Thank you! Our mason is quite proud.

bulletin_message.00:
Oh! I'm fine, I was just... remembering something.

You know, I really do believe in the Ascendancy, that we have a destiny to retake these lost lands. Every new Town that springs up serves to strengthen my belief.

But it's the Towns like yours, dedicated to the support our valorous Guard, that truly warm my heart.

I've brought along plans for the Guard's finest weapons, as you've surely earned the right to forge them.

Now, if my service has taught me anything, it's to eat a good meal when given the chance. I'll leave you to your celebrating!

What an inspiring monument! It truly speaks to the heroism of the Knight Cid.

It reminds me all over again why I became a member of the Guard. It feels like so long ago...

(Anwyn stares into the middle distance, eyes glistening.)

As this shrine bestows its blessing on you all, take a moment to reflect on the world, its mysteries, and its many bounties.

May your Town always be a happy home for its people, and a wellspring for the generosity of the Church of Plenty.
Now, enough somber platitudes - go enjoy the party! I think I saw Mer with some cake earlier that I'd love to get my hands on...

...and may this town flourish in fortune and prosperity, for so long as the Sun shall shine. Umbasa.

Oh! My apologies, I was lost in prayer.

You have a truly wonderful town here, and I feel so privileged to be the missionary to bless this fine monument.
Well, now, it seems my favorite little Outpost is all grown up! Congratulations on your newfound Township!

By the by, this monument here is special, since it's gotten blessed and all - you can build the others if you like, but they'll just be regular old statues. Fancy-looking ones, but none quite so magical.

Still, they make for a nice decoration, don't you think?

Thanks for being such a bunch of charming folks - I'm proud to serve a group of such earnest and ambitious individuals. You make me proud!

Farewell for now, and the best of luck to each of you!

msg3.choice_000: Farewell, Mer! It's been a pleasure!

bulletin_message.00:
Hello again! Now that you've got a bustling little town here, perhaps it's time to start thinking of your next adventure.

I expect some of your citizens are itching to head out and establish a brand new town, even bigger, and even better, with all the lessons learned from this one.

Re-embarking allows you to carry over up to 3 citizens, 10 items, and all your unlocked recipes when starting a new town.

Take the time to consider what you consider most important, what you wish that beacon to stand for. Prosperity? Happiness? Strength? Each is a noble pursuit.

Wishing you the best of luck!

Yours in the Capital,
Mer Burlyhands

P.S. A small gift for you from my personal garden ❀

Congratulations on your Founding!

Your Outpost has been entered into the registry - consider yourselves official! "Her Majesty's Outpost of [str(i18n_data.town_name)]" - it has a nice ring to it, I think. An inspirational Banner design, as well!

All of us here are eager to hear of your success!

As your Outpost grows towards Settlement status, you will start to attract new immigrants.

Your Hearth now is only a spark of what it will one day become - I have faith that it will be a beacon seen all across the Ascendancy.

The messenger bird returns, with a reply from Mer Burlyhands.

The letter has bite marks, and is slightly drooled on. Harold is doing his best.

Which Shrine will you build to signify your Settlement's ascent into Township?

Shrine of Fortune (+1 Mind, Body, and Spirit for your citizens!)

Shrine of Valor (Legendary weapons)

Shrine of Masterwork (Unlocks Masterwork-tier crafts! Four times as Appealing and Expensive as Excellent-tier!)

guildmaster.name: The Guildmaster's Skill
guildmaster.description:
This Township shall be known for its artisans' hard work and dedication to their craft.
  • Allows crafting Masterwork quality items
  • Unlocks artisan-themed decoration recipes

deity.name: Fountain of Plenty
deity.description:
This Township shall show generosity and kindness to the needy.
  • Blesses all citizens with +1 to Mind, Body, and Spirit
  • Unlocks nature-themed decoration recipes

valor.name: The Valor of Cid
valor.description:
This Township shall be dedicated to Cid's valorous example to protect the whole region.
  • Unlocks legendary weapon recipes
  • Unlocks castle decoration recipes

bulletin_message.00:
Next time I visit, I'll bring these folks along with me, and let them plead their cases. Decisions, decisions!

Until then!

Yours in the Capital,
 Mer Burlyhands

Dear [str(i18n_data.town_name)]-ites,

Word around the Capital is that your Settlement has grown since I last saw it, and that it's getting even more bustling by the day! Your Hearth must be burning brightly to attract so many new settlers.

In fact, it's also attracted the attention of a few notable individuals.

As you probably know, a settlement traditionally needs a Sponsorship to become a true Township - generally from a guild, the clergy, or the military.

In the past few days, I've been approached by a few individuals who are very interested to get a look at your town for themselves, and see if you'd be interested in allowing them to be your Sponsor.
Looks like Mer is getting in touch with us again!

Hold in your mind a vision of what your Town will one day be. Your Banner will set that course, but it is up to you to finish it.

Choose well, my friends. I eagerly await your reply.


Yours,

 Mer Burlyhands

An odd bird arrives with a letter in its beak, stamped with the Official Seal of the Ascendancy.

The bird also carries a nametag, which reads 'Harold'

open_letter.choice_001: [skip] We know what banner we want.

bulletin_message.00:
Dear Expedition [str(i18n_data.town_serial_number)],

I hope this letter finds you well. By my guess, you've likely set up camp by now.

As your Capital Liaison, it is my honor to preside, remotely, over the official Founding of your Outpost! I trust that you had ample time to choose a name on your journey.

As you know, every new settlement must choose a Banner.

This Banner reflects your spirit and vision, the uniting factor which brought the Expedition together!

What future did you foresee when you embarked on your quest for Township?
The odd messenger bird scurries off with your Official Settlement Founding Declaration in its beak, carrying it in the vague direction of the capital.

You're not sure how you missed it before, but the bird is wearing a tiny backpack.

It contains a note, which reads "A little something to help you celebrate" along with:

glory.name: Hearth of Glory
glory.description:
Proof that you have military strength, and that you're prepared to keep it on its feet.
  • Allows summoning increasingly difficult enemies to prove your mettle
  • Each rank defeated will boost Daily Update net worth

makers.name: Hearth of the Makers
makers.description:
Proof that gold has been flowing through your settlement, and that you have fine crafters.
  • Generates 5% daily interest on any Gold Coins you have on hand (up to 300 per day)
  • Boosts your Daily Update net worth based on Gold Coins on hand

cheer.name: Hearth of Cheer
cheer.description:
Proof that you have happy, well-fed citizens, and nice places for them to live.
  • Boosts Daily Update net worth based on the overall Morale of your citizens
  • Each day brings a new random buff for your townsfolk.

titan_defeated_town_bonus.name: Land Cleansed of Corruption
titan_defeated_town_bonus.description: With the defeat of its lurking Titan, this town's citizens can't help but be more cheerful.

bulletin_message.00: This calls for a celebration!

With a terrifying roar and a staggering blast of energy, the apparition of the Titan disintegrates, vanishing into nothingness.

As the gloom fades, your citizens marvel at the clear sky stretching out above them, and the land itself seems to breathe a sigh of relief as the laws of nature return to normal.

alert_destroy_crops.title: A blight! We've lost some crops...

alert_initial_spawn_roots.title: The Titan has Roots everywhere, below the ghostly tentacles. Dig them up to hurt the Titan!

alert_spawn_camp.title: A new Portal opens, guarded by Corruptions

alert_spawn_roots.title: More Roots of corruption burrow up. Dig down and take an axe to them!

alert_wave.title: A storm of pure evil erupts from the Titan! Take shelter!

sighted_bulletin.title: Hostile Corruptions, and they're awfully close!

alert_destroy_building.title: A tentacle threatens a structure! Kill it, quickly!

alert_building_was_destroyed.title: One of our buildings was destroyed! We were too late...

alert_initial_camp_spawn.title: Portals! They'll keep spawning crawling bugs until you destroy them, but beware their Corrupted guardians.

alert_new_bugs.title: Crawlers continue to emerge from the portals, hungry for your stockpiles

bulletin_message.00:
"Hello again, my friends of the Monkey! I hope this day finds you at peace.

Honorable Humans, I... have a confession to make."

"When I originally came to you, it was in hopes that you could be... useful to us." he says sheepishly, with drooped ears. "The Titan lurking beneath your town has loomed over my people for generations. I saw in your town a spark of hope that we might be free of its burden.

I apologize for not being more open about my motives before now. I hope I can be forgiven."

"I must admit, your town surpassed my wildest dreams, managing to defeat a foe of such magnitude by your own strength alone.

But not only that - my people and I have grown fond of you beyond expectation, as well" he admits, smiling. "You have been faithful allies to us, and we have learned much from each other. I hope our two warrens can continue our budding friendship."

Sasha looks visibly relieved. "I am glad to hear it! I will take my leave of you for now, but I shall visit again! Once more, congratulations on cleansing your land of the Titan scourge, it is not something easily done. Farewell!"

[Select the Arbalest and Press the 'Awaken Titan' button when you're ready. Once the Arbalest has charged, hit the Fire button to damage the Titan. Killing or destroying the Titan's minions, tentacles, and roots will also reduce its health.]

[Good luck!]

"The Arbalest looks to be in working shape. Isn't it beautiful? The way it sparkles?"

He shakes his head to clear his mind. "Now is no time for distraction. Now that it's standing, all that's left is to activate it and call forth the Titan. Once that's happened, it's up to us to make sure it's charging, but I'll call on you to actually fire. It's your town, so it only seems right"

"Only summon the Titan when you're ready for a siege. It will not be easy, and he will not be kind."
<TKTK Congrats>

"In fact, now that the evil has passed, there should be enough Hearth magic energy up here in the aboveground to support Lapines. So long as you keep that monument standing, you should expect some of us to ask to immigrate here, from time to time."

"Fantastic, I'll let them know post-haste!"

"Now, I... suppose that's all. Enjoy your celebrations!"
"By the stars! By the Divines! You did it! We did it! Did you see the look on his face as he imploded? Kapowww!" Sasha says, with excitement you've never seen from him before.

greet.bulletin_title: Sasha leaps into the air, joyous!

bulletin_message.00:
"Oh, I see - it's not my place to decide, so I'll respect your wishes."

"Now, I suppose that's all the business - let's enjoy the celebrations!"

"Also... the Geomancer who worked most closely on the Arbalest, who made it happen at all, has expressed to me a desire to stay here beside it, among the people who defended it. I think they've earned their place here, but that's not for me to decide."

"What do you say, would you like this Rabbit Geomancer to join your town?"
<TKTK Request 3>

Sasha stops, holding his knees and panting slightly. "Whew... oh... look, over at the Arbalest! It seems... its job is done, and now it's gone dormant. Let's have it serve as a monument, a memorial, to what the friendship of our two clans could achieve!"

intro.choice_000: I'm glad we could do some good

bulletin_message.00:
Would you like to let this Rabbit to join your town?

[They're surprisingly fast for their low Body!]

msg1.dialog_title: A member of Clan Amberstone wishes to join your town!

grant_recurring_bun_citizen.notification_title: A new Rabbit citizen has joined your town!

grant_bun_citizen.notification_title: Sasha's disciple has joined your town!

bulletin_message.00:
This sounds crazy, but I swear I saw an oversized pair of rabbit ears poking out from behind a bush for a second on my way here.

Reminds me of the old tales about rabbit-people. You don't think...

msg1.choice_000: Huh! Maybe we should put some carrots out...
msg1.choice_000b: Huh! Maybe we should put some vegetables out...

bulletin_message.00:
We left those carrots out overnight, and in the morning they were gone... along with the baskets.

Strange...

We left those veggies out overnight, and in the morning they were gone... along with the baskets.

Strange...
We'll leave the veggies out past the edge of town overnight. Wonder if they'll still be there in the morning...
We'll leave the carrots out past the edge of town overnight. Wonder if they'll still be there in the morning...

00b_sighting_quest.title: Veggies for a maybe-Rabbit
